short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure and easy-to-use hybrid Account abstraction wallet that supports EOAs and Smart Accounts on Ethereum and EVM chains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here is what Ambire Wallet has to offer:

THE BASICS
- Native support for EOAs (e.g., your MetaMask account) and Smart Accounts
- Self-custodial by design (you have full control over your assets)
- Supports Ethereum and EVM chains, including Polygon, Optimism, Arbitrum, Base, and more
- Same wallet address across all blockchains, including for Smart Accounts
- Audited over 10 times with no critical vulnerabilities found

SECURITY FEATURES
- Hardware wallet support (Trezor, Ledger, Grid+)
- Advanced transaction simulation on-chain (shows the future wallet balance before the transaction is executed)
- Open-source and continually-audited code
- Limited token approvals preventing wallet drains

META-TRANSACTIONS
- Batch transactions into one and skip the token approvals
- Simulate transaction outcomes in a risk-free environment
- Automatic front-running/sandwiching protection via Flashbots

GAS FEES SAVINGS
- Prepay for gas in stablecoins, native, or ERC-20 tokens with Ambire Gas Tank
- Cross-chain gas payments: top up on any chain and pay on any other
- Get cashback for using the Gas Tank feature

THE $WALLET DAO
- Governed by the $WALLET token holders
- Get rewarded with $WALLET tokens for using the wallet
- Cast your feature request on the dedicated platform
